comments.body: Wish we had made this an enum, oh well.

Let's make room for future resource lock types, considering https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/8deb70c2ad6df1c02f88c0eec521c8ca1a4829f7/staging/src/k8s.io/component-base/config/v1alpha1/types.go#L50 They did not foresee `leases` either.

Why not go ahead and make this an enum? (i.e., give it its own type?)

I guess that is backwards compatible and can be added in the future.
I'd like to be consistent with other instances of resource type. I think we should but that seems like clean up better done in a separate PR.
